issue.title: [Rust] Appveyor builds are broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4185](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4185). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Changes to Rust directory structure have broken appveyor on all branches - this is trivial to fix and I will push a PR shortly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4185?focusedCommentId=16736674) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
